transcript:
Customer: ha sir thik hai
Executive: ha sir ha to mai keh raha tha starting me mai aapke sath abhi mehnat karunga sath hi sath aapke mujhe bhi samajh me aa raha hai aapka aap kahan pe dekhte ho nahi nahi nahi mai India mart ke head office me baithta hu Noida se
Customer: aap Noida baithte hai
Executive: bilkul
Customer: acha acha actually kya mai bhi ghaziabad ki baat kar raha hu na
Executive: kahan se sir
Customer: ghaziabad
Executive: acha acha to ye to west bengal kar raha hai mujhe
Customer: sorry
Executive: mai keh raha hu GST to aapka west bengal kar raha hai mujhe
Customer: ha aisa hai na sir GST hamara waha bengal ka hai
Executive: acha acha
Customer: lekin humne ek registered office yaha pe khola hua hai ghaziabad me
Executive: okay okay to ghaziabad me kahan sir jaise mujhe shipra mall tak pata hai thoda idea hai
Customer: actually kya hai lalkua dekha hoga aapne
Executive: aap bataiye
Customer: lalkua lalkua ke pass me apna silver city cinema hai usi ke pass me hamara office hai
Executive: acha acha acha
Customer: udhar udhar sir starting me starting me sir na sir kya hota hai na starting me mehnat lagti hai profile pe
Customer: h nahi us side ka us side ka jo area hai wo mr vijay dekhte hai na ek
Executive: acha vijay vijay agrawal hai yaha pe office me hai to
Customer: ha jinko abhi recently promotion bhi hua tha
Executive: ha ha
Customer: to unhone kiya hai kya sir padega mujhe
Customer: na bhai sir isme to
Executive: kya sir nahi nahi hamara nahi dekhta wo wo om wo om shiv enterprise wale ko dekhta hai wo
Customer: acha kisi aur ko nahi dekhte okay
Executive: mai janta hu unko actually kya hai india mart me na kafi log hai jinko mai alag alag company ko represent karne hu mai janta hu un logo ko
Executive: h
Executive: to agar koi aapki ye jo same product line me koi aur company chal rahi hogi to wo bhi mujhe bata dena isse kya hoga ek bar tally karne me easy ho jata hai ki unko business aa raha hai to unke kya mapping ho rakhi hai hai na product me mapping
Customer: dekhiye sabse main pehle kya hai mai do companyo ka naam bata deta hu aapko ek to om shiv enterprise hi hai
Executive: wo shiv
Customer: om shiv om shiv
Executive: om shiv
Customer: h enterprise ghaziabad leader ke hai ha inhone actually package bada bada package le rakha hai inhone ha ha leader actually preferred leader liya hai fir industrial leader nahi hai apne leader bhi le liya ye to bahut jyada 40 50 lakh ka investment kar diya hai kya
Customer: deepak kumar inke director hai
Executive: ha ha ha ha uske uske uske baad dusre number pe mac tech international private limited hogi
Executive: mac tech
Customer: m a c t e c h
Executive: ha mac tech ke baad sir
Customer: mac tech hai na usme usme naam aa raha hoga prashant sharma
Executive: ha modinagar se to sir bahut purane purane dikhte hai sir bahut pura ekdam ek ek category ko na inhone aisa kara hai ki har city me dikhe india page pe dikhe sab se log business bana pa rahe honge aur apni visibility jo ek sabse badi problem kya hai ki apni jo aap isse acha to aapne ye kiya hota ki maximizer ke jagah MDC aur star karaya hota
Customer: to mere ko mere ko to aapke yahi se hi confirm kiya gaya tha ki aap maximize le lijiye sabse best hai
Executive: acha acha are sir sabse best is vajah se nahi hai mai aapko reason bata deta hu chala ko aap chala rahe sabse best isliye nahi hai kyuki jo aapki visibility hai na abhi west bengal se badhna start hogi hai first of all samajh rahe GST jahan ki hoti hai to bhai jyadatar lead aur inquiry ka jo generation rahega shayad west bengal side se aapke pass do call bhi to aayi west bengal side se maine pucha bhi aapse
Customer: ha maine aapko bataya na wo aayi thi mere pass
Executive: to sabse pehle visibility waha se start hoti hai to agar mai kyu bol raha hu MDC star lene ke liye kyuki isme kya hota hai ki jin 10 shahro ki aap jyada lead le rahe hote consume karte waha pe aapki visibility aane lagti to waha se kya customers ki call aur inquiry aane lagti in logo ne isliye to preferred leader ya preferred star le rakha hai mac tech ya dusri company jo thi kyuki usse kya hota hai ki mere ko ye bataiye agar usko idhar local side ki agar lead wagera chahiye to uske liye mujhe kya karna hoga ghaziabad jaise ghaziabad delhi NCR ha delhi NCR ki lead aapko jyada leni padegi aur starting me ye sab jyada dhyan na dijiye ek piece ki hai do piece ki hai iske chakkar me na rahiye lead to waise bhi bekar ja rahi hai jo aap nahi use kar rahe ho jab nahi use kar rahe ho bekar hi ja rahi hai na wo to aap khatam hi ho rahi hai ha to starting me promotion pe aap dhyan dijiye mai keh raha hu na dedh mahina promotion ke liye do acha aap choti choti lead ko uthaiye baat kariye us pe apna catalog link share kariye taki jyada log click kare aur aapke footfall badhe aapke website pe aur khas kar delhi NCR ke andar
Customer: thik hai
Executive: pehle to aapko ye kam karna hai sir thik hai na abhi to matlab paisa to bhul jaiye ki abhi koi business aana hai dedh mahina aapko dimag se hata dena abhi to ye sochna hai ki kaise mujhe apna promotion aur visibility badhani hai h sir to business to aata hi hai aisa to hai nahi ki india mart pe to business nahi aata nahi aata hota to ye mac tech
Customer: ko to dekh rahe hai kafi din se
Executive: h to wahi hai sir sabka ek dheere dheere time hai banne me koi bhi company ekdam se badi nahi banti
Executive: hello ab jaise maine khola sir ye dekhiye a metric 2012 me 22000 10000 wale check diya karte the theek hai ji ka check diya aur hua hai 22500 diya hoga shayad fir check diya trust seal ke liye 22500 hai na 2013 2014 ki baat kar raha hu 2014 14 ke aas pass to trading firm thi
Executive: ha sir sir to sir revolve hai na evolution hota hai sir wahi batana chah raha hu aapko to isme kam rahega to kam banega
Customer: thik hai thik hai sir mai dekhte hai isko jaise bhi hai ye mat sochiye nahi hai ki sir agar sir agar mujhe aapse contact karna hai to isi number pe kar sakta hu aap likho number likho mera whatsapp mera ye to officially call chali gayi hai likho aap 8076
Executive: 076 likh liya 36 8076 ha 36
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to improve lead generation in local area.

- Inquired about local lead generation process.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of promotion.

- Suggested focusing on Delhi NCR region.

- Provided alternate contact number.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, promotion, visibility, delhi ncr
